title: Cardigan: Arrest after woman, 27, dies in A484 crash
article: Police investigating the death of a 27-year-old woman after a crash have arrested a 23-year-old man in connection with the incident. The collision happened on Saturday evening on the A484 between Cardigan and Llechryd, Ceredigion, Dyfed Powys police said. Officers have said they want to speak to anyone who was in the area between 22:00 GMT and 23:00 GMT. The road was closed, but has since reopened following the incident.
